name: A Balloon's Journey (lin25)
description:
Take a journey in a balloon to see how far you can go!

Controls

Up - Spend fuel to raise your balloon

Down - Spend fuel to push your balloon down

Space - Spend fuel to keep your balloon at the same height

Z - Stop at sky islands

Enter - Confirm

Credits

Sfx from Zapsplat and Gfx Sound

Background Image from Unity Asset Store -https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/11611

BGM("Panorama") - https://zakiro101.itch.io/

Animalese generated from https://acedio.github.io/animalese.js/

Lisa Ye, Graham Todd, Aliah Jefree
